channel.title: NEW To privite servers RSC
channel.description:
Alright so i am new at this privite server thing i use to play RSC on orginal runescape, but my questen is. Is this possible to get working over lan me and my brother want to play RSC together, but i cant get how to get this working ...
Im going to work and ill be back around 3 hours so i hope to get some replys. Thanks :)

item.title: NEW To privite servers RSC
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

You can set up your own server if thats what you mean, like portforward from your desktop and you and your brother can enjoy playing by yourselves, or you can go to the Server Advertisement section and play a server that you find the most appealing for your needs.

Read full topic
